outreachTemplates.fiverr: Hi [name], I'm working on a YouTube video project that needs a custom Minecraft map. I found your WorldPainter work and it looks great. I need a [map type] approximately [size] blocks. Timeline is flexible. Can you tell me about your availability and pricing for something like this?
outreachTemplates.planetMinecraft: Hi [name], I came across your post on Planet Minecraft forums. I'm working on a YouTube video project and need a custom WorldPainter map. Would you be interested in discussing this? I'm looking for [map type] around [size] blocks.

iceDragonSpecific.discord: Hi Regnozes, I saw your WorldPainter work on Planet Minecraft forums. I'm working on a YouTube video about an Ice Dragon evolution series and need a custom arctic/fantasy terrain (approximately 3000x3000 blocks) that would work well for dragon-scale content. Do you have availability for a project like this? Would love to discuss pricing and timeline.
iceDragonSpecific.fiverrIceDragon: Hi [name], I'm working on a YouTube video about Ice Dragon evolution stages and need a custom Minecraft map. I'm looking for an arctic/fantasy terrain with mountains, ice caves, and open areas for dragon-scale builds (approximately 3000x3000 blocks). The map will be featured in a video with 100K+ expected views. Can you tell me about your availability and pricing for something like this?

iceDragonProject.description: Ice Dragon evolution stages video - needs custom arctic terrain with mountains, ice caves, and open areas
iceDragonProject.priorityContact: Regnozes (Discord: Regnozes#4631) - Direct contact available, no Fiverr fees
